title: PremiumCraft Liquid Candle Dye Concentrate, Black/Gray
features: Each candle dye colors 22 pounds of candle wax to medium shade.
Can be combined to produce a variety of colors.
Each pack includes the following colors: Black/Gray
description: Liquid dyes are highly concentrated wax colorants that readily dissolve in a variety of a hot waxes. Typical dye amount used per pound of wax is 5 drops for 0.05% level producing a medium shade. Each sample bottle colors over 22 pounds of wax to 0.05% level or 111 pounds of wax at 0.01% level. Results vary based on application.   Approximate concentrations that produce colors described are noted in parenthesis next to the colors.  Included colors: Black(0.2%)/Grey(0.01%).
